npc.name: Agatha
npc.description: All we know is that she is a Powerful Entity. Atreyu first heard of her when he met Sister Gary at the Shrine of Luck in Phandalin. Sister Gary wanted us to confront Agatha to inquire about the location of a spellbook

npc.name: Black Mamba
npc.description: Bad Dude. Drow (Dark Elf).

npc.name: Carp
npc.description: Halfling boy in Phandalin who is friends with Pip. His mother led us to Rudolph to aid in the pursuit of the Cragmaws. He discovered a tunnel somewhere near the Alderleaf Farm that helped us find the Rembrandt's Hideout.

npc.name: Clark
npc.description: Bug Bear, bad guy who works for the Black Mamba. We killed him in Cragmaw Hideout

npc.name: Darryn Eaterman
npc.description: Wily old man in Phandalin who hates the Rembrandt hoodlums.

npc.name: Darya
npc.description: Friend of Atreyu & Fauna who we encountered while she was looking for Winnie, their old friend and healer.

npc.name: Dave Grohl
npc.description: Bug Bear & king of the Cragmaw tribe. He is currently hunting us, either under orders of the Black Mamba or for personal reasons since we steamrolled their hideout.

npc.name: Dominick
npc.description: Our Lord and Savior

npc.name: Duncan
npc.description: Captive Rembrandt in Phandalin who is also our homeboy.

npc.name: Dyslexia
npc.description: Dragon & Sister to Venomfang who took his lair from him.

npc.name: Esper
npc.description: Zawdust's Cat

npc.name: Fell Dendrar
npc.description: Woodcarver who worked in Phandalin. Was killed by The Rembrandts.

npc.name: Harbin
npc.description: Pale Human & Town Mayor of Phandalin who was originally kind of an asshole, but has since started to lighten up and be a better leader after the Rembrandts were dealt with

npc.name: Hummus Krust
npc.description: Necromancer from Parfait. Has an army of zombies that he can control. He gave us some gold in exchange for eliminating the orcs nearby (that we were already on a mission to eliminate) and also gave Lance a cool bone tubed item for bringing back a dead orc to use as another zombie. Likes Breakfast.

npc.name: Iarno Albreck (Glass Staff)
npc.description: Good guy that turned out to be a bad guy. Was part of the Lord's Alliance, but ended up being Glass Staff, leader of the Rembrandts who is also working for the Black Mamba. After defeating him in the Rembrandt's Hideout, he was locked up in Phandalin. Last we heard, he was being transferred to Neverwinter, but had not gotten word that he arrived there.

npc.name: Lorde's Alliance
npc.description: Group of good guys. Known Members are Sildar Hallwinter & Iarno Albreck, but Iarno ended actually being a bad man (Glass Staff).

npc.name: Nothic
npc.description: Eye Monster who we didn't fight because we beat the Rembrandts too quickly. Likes Meat.

npc.name: Pip
npc.description: Human Boy and son of Toeblinn Stonehill in Phandalin who is also friends with Carp.

npc.name: Rembrandts
npc.description: Bad hoodlum gang in Phandalin led by Glass Staff who is involved with the Black Mamba.

npc.name: Rockseeker Bros
npc.description: Gundren, Tharden, & Nundro, the brothers who discovered Wave Echo Cave. They gave us the initial quest to escort a cart of goods and supplies to Phandalin in exchange for equity in Wave Echo Cave. There whereabouts are currently unknown and we need to find them.

npc.name: Rudolph
npc.description: Gandalf-looking, old white dude, and a friend of Dargor's who is currently residing in Thundertree trying to reinvigorate the land. When we met, he handed me Wendy's Blue Ribbon because he sensed it matched my aura. He gave us directions to Cragmaw Castle and, although he will not tell us the location, he agreed tolead us to Wave Echo Cave.

npc.name: Sildar Hallwinter
npc.description: Member of Lorde's Alliance who we rescued in Cragmaw Hideout. Helped us with the Rembrandts and capturing Glass Staff. He is currently actiing Sheriff / Police Chief of Phandalin.

npc.name: Sister Gary
npc.description: Lives in Phandalin and

npc.name: Toeblinn Stonehill
npc.description: Innkeep at the Stonehill Inn who's son is Pip.

npc.name: Venomfang
npc.description: Dragon who we encountered in Thundertree, who tricked us and almost wiped us in one hit. We came close to defeating him, but he fled and got away.

npc.name: Winnie
npc.description: A Old Healer & friend to Atreyu, Fauna, and Darya who is lost or has been taken.

npc.name: Yeemik
npc.description: Cragmaw Goblin under Clark's command. We killed him in Cragmaw Hideout.

npc.name: Zawdust
npc.description: Crazy old wizard who led is into a tower of cool puzzles.

places.name: Old Owl Well
places.description: Ruins of an old watchtower where Hummus Krust, the Necromancer, has been hiding out.

places.name: Phandalin
places.description: First main town we visited where...
